dcterms:description: The Stanford Sentiment Treebank (SST) is a dataset that contains sentiment annotations for phrases in a tree-structured format, allowing for both binary and fine-grained sentiment classification tasks.
dcterms:title: Stanford Sentiment Treebank (SST)
